text: George Miller (19 August 1929 - 1 January 2017) was a Scottish cricketer. He played one first-class match for Scotland in 1955. He was also the secretary for the Scottish Cricket Union between 1966 and 1976. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1929 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Scottish cricketers Category:Cricketers from Edinburgh
title: George Miller (cricketer)
